verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>,

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, all that enter <S%H935><s%> upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, about the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>:

when the camp <S%H4264><s%> setteth forward <S%H5265><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and they shall take down <S%H3381><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen <S%H4539><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony with it <S%H5715><s%>,

and shall put <S%H5414><s%> thereon a covering <S%H3681><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> over <S%H4605><s%> it a cloth <S%H899><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves thereof <S%H905><s%>.

And upon the table <S%H7979><s%> of showbread <S%H6440><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> thereon the dishes <S%H7086><s%>, and the spoons <S%H3709><s%>, and the bowls <S%H4518><s%> and the cups <S%H7184><s%> wherewith <S%H5262><s%> to pour out <S%H8548><s%>; and the continual bread shall be thereon <S%H3899><s%>:

and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon them a cloth <S%H899><s%> of scarlet <S%H8438><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the same with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves thereof <S%H905><s%>.

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of the light <S%H3974><s%>, and its lamps <S%H5216><s%>, and its snuffers <S%H4457><s%>, and its snuffdishes <S%H4289><s%>, and all the oil <S%H8081><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H8334><s%>, wherewith they minister unto it:

and they shall put <S%H5414><s%> it and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof within a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the frame <S%H4132><s%>.

And upon the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves thereof <S%H905><s%>:

and they shall take <S%H3947><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of ministry <S%H8335><s%>, wherewith they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them in a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> them with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on the frame <S%H4132><s%>.
And they shall take away the ashes <S%H1878><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and spread <S%H6566><s%> a purple <S%H713><s%> cloth thereon <S%H899><s%>:

and they shall put <S%H5414><s%> upon it all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H8334><s%>, wherewith they minister about it <S%H4289><s%>, the firepans, the flesh-hooks <S%H4207><s%>, and the shovels <S%H3257><s%>, and the basins <S%H4219><s%>, all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>; and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon it a covering <S%H3681><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves thereof <S%H905><s%>.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of covering <S%H3680><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and all the furniture <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, as the camp <S%H4264><s%> is set forward <S%H5265><s%>; after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H1121><s%>, the sons of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H5060><s%>: but they shall not touch the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, lest they die <S%H4191><s%>. These things are the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And the charge <S%H6486><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the continual <S%H8548><s%> meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, the charge <S%H6486><s%> of all the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and of all that therein is <S%H6944><s%>, the sanctuary, and the furniture thereof <S%H3627><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Cut ye not off <S%H3772><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>;

but thus do <S%H6213><s%> unto them <S%H2421><s%>, that they may live, and not die <S%H4191><s%>, when they approach <S%H5066><s%> unto the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>: Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%>, and appoint <S%H7760><s%> them every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his service <S%H5656><s%> and to his burden <S%H4853><s%>;
but they shall not go in <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> even for a moment <S%H1104><s%>, lest they die <S%H4191><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> also <S%H1><s%>, by their fathers' houses <S%H1004><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>;

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them <S%H935><s%>; all that enter in to wait <S%H6633><s%> upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>, in serving <S%H5647><s%> and in bearing burdens <S%H4853><s%>:

they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the tent <S%H4908><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, its covering <S%H4372><s%>, and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of sealskin <S%H8476><s%> that is above <S%H4605><s%> upon it <S%H4539><s%>, and the screen for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>,

and the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, which is by the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and by the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>, and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of their service <S%H5656><s%>, and whatsoever shall be done <S%H6213><s%> with them <S%H5647><s%>: therein shall they serve.

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>, in all their burden <S%H4853><s%>, and in all their service <S%H5656><s%>; and ye shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> unto them in charge <S%H4931><s%> all their burden <S%H4853><s%>.

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and their charge <S%H4931><s%> shall be under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.
As for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, thou shalt number <S%H6485><s%> them by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>;

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them <S%H935><s%>, every one that entereth upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And this is the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden <S%H4853><s%>, according to all their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof <S%H5982><s%>, and the pillars thereof <S%H134><s%>, and the sockets thereof,

and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%>, and their pins <S%H3489><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>, with all their instruments <S%H3627><s%>, and with all their service <S%H5656><s%>: and by name <S%H8034><s%> ye shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden <S%H4853><s%>.

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, according to all their service <S%H5656><s%>, in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>, and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>,

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entered <S%H935><s%> upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, for work <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:
and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>, all that did serve <S%H5647><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, their families <S%H4940><s%>, and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>,

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entered <S%H935><s%> upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, for work <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>,

even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4940><s%>, by their families, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, were two thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, all that did serve <S%H5647><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>,

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entered <S%H935><s%> upon the service <S%H6635><s%>, for work <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>,
even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%>, were three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

All those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>,

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entered <S%H935><s%> in to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of service <S%H5656><s%>, and the work of bearing burdens <S%H4853><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>,
even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H8083><s%>, were eight thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%>.

According to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according to his service <S%H5656><s%>, and according to his burden <S%H4853><s%>: thus were they numbered <S%H6485><s%> of him <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
